item.title: Happening just now... 6th Conference of the R Spanish User Community
item.description: The R-Spain Conferences have been taking place since 2009 as an expression of the growing interest that R elicits in many fileds. The organisers are the Comunidad R Hispano (R-es). The community supports many groups and initiatives aimed to develop R knowledge and widen its use. To attend the talks by streaming (they are in Spanish) you must registrate. There is also a scientific programme with the presentations (some in English) here.
